TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IColumnMappingCollection implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 包含 DataColumnMapping 物件的集合，並且是由 所實作，這是由 .NET Framework 資料提供者 (Data Provider) 所共同使用。

span.span: Contains a collection of DataColumnMapping objects, and is implemented by the , which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面可讓繼承類別實作的 ColumnMapping 集合。The interface enables an inheriting class to implement a ColumnMapping collection. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[DataAdapter DataTable 和 DataColumn 對應](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md)。For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md). 應用程式不會建立的執行個體介面直接，但是會建立繼承的類別的執行個體。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits . 繼承的類別必須實作所有繼承的成員，和通常用來定義其他成員將提供者特有的功能。Classes that inherit must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如，介面會定義方法。For example, the interface defines the method. 接著，類別繼承此方法，並定義兩個其他多載。In turn, the class inherits this method, and defines two additional overloads of . ## Examples 下列範例會使用衍生類別中的執行個體至數個物件加入至其集合，然後按一下 顯示一份那些對應來源資料表。The following example uses an instance of the derived class, , to several objects to its collection, and then displays a list of those mapped source tables. 這個範例假設已經建立。This example assumes that a has already been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 當您繼承自介面，您應該實作下列建構函式：

span.span: When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructor:

span.description: 建立空的 ColumnMappingCollection 類別。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會搜尋在衍生類別的執行個體，指定之來源的資料行名稱內集合。The following example searches for an instance of the derived class, , with the given source column name within a collection. 如果存在，這個範例顯示名稱和對應的索引。If the exists, the example displays the name and the index of the mapping. 如果對應不存在，則這個範例會顯示錯誤。If the mapping does not exist, the example displays an error. 這個範例假設在建立集合。This example assumes that a collection has been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.this1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.this1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會搜尋在衍生類別的執行個體，具有給定`SourceColumn`名稱內集合。The following example searches for an instance of the derived class, , with the given `SourceColumn` name within a collection. 如果存在，就會移除對應。If the exists, the mapping is removed. 這個範例假設在建立集合。This example assumes that a collection has been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
